title: Clock Divider Function Block
description: This function block implements a clock divider that generates multiple output signals based on a clock input signal. It also includes a reset feature that initializes the outputs and the internal counter.
name: CLK_DIV

input.name: clk
input.description: The clock input signal used to increment the counter.

input.name: rst
input.description: The reset input signal that initializes the counter and output states.

output.name: Q0
output.description: The first output bit representing the least significant bit of the counter.

output.name: Q1
output.description: The second output bit of the counter.

output.name: Q2
output.description: The third output bit of the counter.

output.name: Q3
output.description: The fourth output bit of the counter.

output.name: Q4
output.description: The fifth output bit of the counter.

output.name: Q5
output.description: The sixth output bit of the counter.

output.name: Q6
output.description: The seventh output bit of the counter.

output.name: Q7
output.description: The eighth output bit representing the most significant bit of the counter.
